page.title: 15Law and Order,New Galloway
page.content: There is one Police Officer whose territorial duty extends from Carsphairn,12Kms.N. of New Galloway to Mossdale,5Kms.S. Community policing is the key word as, very rarely,is the law broken.Our Policeman checks the bikes and prepares the children for their cycling test given by the Stranraer Transport Police. Talks are, also, given on road safety and not to talk to strangers(this is a difficult concept to understand as the village is so open and friendly).If an arrest is made, the person is, generally, transferred to Castle Douglas Police Station. There is a Sheriff Court at Kirkcudbright and at Dumfries for lesser matters but serious crimes are dealt with at Dumfries High Court. There is, also, a prison in Dumfries, for Young Offenders.
